languages.text: "Я считаю, что унаследовать состояние по праву крови должен Кас Беллардо".
"I find that Kas Bellardo should inherit the fortune by right of blood."
languages.original_text: "Я считаю, что унаследовать состояние по праву крови должен Кас Беллардо".

traits.locale_text: "I find that Kas Bellardo should inherit the fortune by right of blood."
"I find that Kas Bellardo should inherit the fortune by right of blood."
"I find that Kas Bellardo should inherit the fortune by right of blood."

languages.text: “按照血缘关系，我认为卡斯·贝拉多应当成为遗产的继承人。”
languages.original_text: "I find that Kas Bellardo should inherit the fortune by right of blood."

traits.locale_text: “按照血缘关系，我认为卡斯·贝拉多应当成为遗产的继承人。”

languages.text: «Kas Bellardo debería heredar la fortuna por derecho de sangre».
languages.original_text: "I find that Kas Bellardo should inherit the fortune by right of blood."

traits.locale_text: «Kas Bellardo debería heredar la fortuna por derecho de sangre».

languages.text: 「血縁者であるキャス・ベラルドが遺産を相続すべきだと思う」
languages.original_text: "I find that Kas Bellardo should inherit the fortune by right of blood."

traits.locale_text: 「血縁者であるキャス・ベラルドが遺産を相続すべきだと思う」

languages.text: "Ich denke, Kas Bellardo sollte das Vermögen von Bluts wegen erben."
languages.original_text: "I find that Kas Bellardo should inherit the fortune by right of blood."

traits.locale_text: "Ich denke, Kas Bellardo sollte das Vermögen von Bluts wegen erben."

languages.text: « Je pense que Kas devrait hériter de la fortune de son père, par le droit du sang. »
languages.original_text: "I find that Kas Bellardo should inherit the fortune by right of blood."

traits.locale_text: « Je pense que Kas devrait hériter de la fortune de son père, par le droit du sang. »

languages.text: "Kandan doğan hak dolayısıyla mirası Kas Bellardo almalı."
languages.original_text: "I find that Kas Bellardo should inherit the fortune by right of blood."

traits.locale_text: "Kandan doğan hak dolayısıyla mirası Kas Bellardo almalı."
